#include<util/delay.h>

#include "STD_TYPES.h"
#include "BTT_MATH.h"
#include "ERR_TYPE.h"

#include "PORT_interface.h"

#include "DIO_interface.h"

#include "SSD_interface.h"
#include "CLCD_interface.h"
#include "LED_interface.h"
#include "Switch_interface.h"

int main(){

	PORT_voidInit();
	CLCD_voidInit();

	uint8 Local_u8NameOneUP[5][8] =
	{{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000111,0B00000101},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001000,0B00011110},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001000,0B00011110,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00010000,0B00011100,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00010000,0B00011100,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000}};
	uint8 Local_u8NameOneDOWN[5][8] =
	{{0B00000111,0B00000101,0B00010100,0B00011111,0B00000000,0B00010000,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001000,0B00011110,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001000,0B00011110,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00010000,0B00011100},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100}};

	uint8 Local_u8NameTwoUP[5][8] =
	{{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000010},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000100,0B00000101,0B00011111},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000100,0B00000101,0B00011111,0B00000000,0B00000001},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001000,0B00001010,0B00011111,0B00000000,0B00000010,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00001000,0B00001010,0B00011111,0B00000000,0B00000010,0B00000000,0B00000000}};
	uint8 Local_u8NameTwoDOWN[5][8] =
	{{0B00000000,0B00000010,0B00000010,0B00001111,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000100,0B00000101,0B00011111,0B00000000,0B00000001,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000100,0B00000101,0B00011111,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001000,0B00001010,0B00011111},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001000}};

	uint8 Local_u8NameThreeUP[5][8] =
	{{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000111},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001110},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001110,0B00000010,0B00001110},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00011101,0B00000100,0B00011100,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00011101,0B00000100,0B00011100,0B00000000,0B00000000}};
	uint8 Local_u8NameThreeDOWN[5][8] =
	{{0B00000000,0B00000111,0B00000101,0B00000111,0B00000001,0B00000111,0B00000000,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001110,0B00000010,0B00001110,0B00000000},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00001110,0B00001010,0B00001110,0B00000010},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00011100,0B00010100,0B00011101},
	{0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00000000,0B00011000}};

	uint8 Lcoal_u8OuterIterator = 15;
	uint8 Lcoal_u8InnerIterator = 0;

	uint8 Local_u8XPos = 15;
	uint8 Local_u8YPos = 1;

	uint8 isUp = 1;
	uint8 Counter = 0;
	for(;Lcoal_u8OuterIterator > 0;Lcoal_u8OuterIterator--)
	{
		for(Lcoal_u8InnerIterator = 0;Lcoal_u8InnerIterator < 5;Lcoal_u8InnerIterator++)
		{
			if(isUp == 1)
			{
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameOneUP[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],0,Local_u8XPos,Local_u8YPos);
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameTwoUP[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],1,Local_u8XPos-1,Local_u8YPos);
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameThreeUP[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],2,Local_u8XPos-2,Local_u8YPos);
				_delay_ms(200);
				CLCD_voidClearDisplay();
			}
			else if(isUp == 0)
			{
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameOneDOWN[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],0,Local_u8XPos,Local_u8YPos);
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameTwoDOWN[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],1,Local_u8XPos-1,Local_u8YPos);
				CLCD_voidSendSpecialChatacter(Local_u8NameThreeDOWN[Lcoal_u8InnerIterator],2,Local_u8XPos-2,Local_u8YPos);
				_delay_ms(200);
				CLCD_voidClearDisplay();
			}

		}
		Counter++;
		if((isUp == 1 && Local_u8YPos == 1) || (isUp == 0 && Local_u8YPos == 0))
			TOG_BIT(Local_u8YPos,0);

		Local_u8XPos--;
		if((Local_u8XPos - 2) < 0)
			break;

		if(Counter == 2)
		{
			TOG_BIT(isUp,0);
			Counter = 0;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
